content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Greetings Maryam, thank you for your interest in our apartment in Magdeburg. Let's begin the negotiation focused solely on the rental price. I originally had higher aspirations but am willing to be flexible for the right tenant.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for your openness. I am seeking the most affordable price possible for this apartment. 'I propose the rental price of 450 Euro!'
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: While I appreciate your interest in the apartment, Maryam, I must decline this proposal due to my expectations not being met. My goal is to obtain the highest price for this prime location. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
